dialog: Oh, can you help me find Dr. Meade?
They say we may have lost the battle but we didn't lose the war.
Yes, my friends, we are under attack.
You may have read about this in your local newspapers or seen it on the evening news.
We are living in an era marked by the spread of integration and miscegenation.
The Brown decision, forced upon us by the Jewishcontrolled puppets on the U.S. Supreme Court, compelling white children to go to school with an inferior race, is the final nail in a coffin...
Is the final nail in a black coffin towards America becoming a mongrel nation.
We had a great way of life. We had...
We had a great way of life.
We had a great way of life until the Martin Luther Coons of this world and their army of Commies started their civil rights assault against our holy white Protestant values.
Do you really want your precious white child going to school with Negroes?
They're lying, dirty monkeys, stopping at nothing to gain their equality with white men.
Rapists, murderers, craving the virgin white...
Rapists, murderers, craving the virgin pure flesh of white women.
And the Negro's insidious tactics, under the tutelage of highranking, bloodsucking Jews, using an army of outside northern black beast...
What is it? "Black beast..."  "Agitators."  God, watch this! God!
Using an army of outside northern black beast agitators determined to overthrow the Godcommanded and biblically inspired rule of the white race.
Why weren't you drafted into the Vietnam War?
How do you feel about Vietnam?
Would you call yourself a womanizer?
Only those prescribed by my doctor, sir.
Well, that's kind of rare for a young, hip soul brother like you.
But my father was in the military, and my parents, they raised me the right way.
How do you get along with people, generally?
Sir, they treat me right, I treat them right.
Like I said before, I was raised up the right way, so...
I mean, have you ever had any negative...
What would you do if another cop called you a nigger?
There's never been a black cop in this city.
Now, if we make you an officer, you will, in effect, be the Jackie Robinson of the Colorado Springs Police Force.
And if you know anything about Jackie Robinson, you know he had to take a lot of, uh, guff from his fellow teammates, the fans, other teams and the press.
I know the Jackie Roosevelt Robinson story, sir.
Good. So, knowing that, if somebody calls you a nigger, will you be able to turn the other cheek?
If I had to, sir, yes.
Son, the mayor, the Chief and I think you might be the man to open things up around here.
Chief Bridges will be your Branch Rickey.
But I can only do so much.
The weight of this is going to be on you and you alone.
Thank you for the opportunity, gentlemen.
I loved her in The Last Picture Show.
I think she's a really good actress.
Oh, come on. You know you want some of that.
Give me the record for that toad, Maurice Smalls.
While you're at it, grab another toad, Tippy Birdsong.
May I have a minute, please?
Sergeant Trapp, Chief Bridges, I'll get right to it.
I'd like to be an undercover detective.
You just joined the force, rookie.
I think I can do some real good there.
There's a real niche for me.
Get in where I fit in.
You think a lot of yourself, don't you?
And I hate the records room.
I think records is a good place for you to start, rookie.
Chief, do you want me cleanshaven?
I can even chop down the natural.
No, no, no. You keep it.
I need a file on a toad.
I said I need a file on a toad.
I said I don't have any toads.
You give me their names, I'll get you the file.
I heard you think you're hot shit, but you ain't nothing but a cold fart.
Was that respectful enough for you, Officer Toad?
You're coming in a little early today.
I got an assignment for you.
We have limited time, so I'll be quick.
The black radical, Stokely Carmichael, is giving a speech tonight at Bell's Nightingale.
Carmichael is a former highmucketymuck with the Black Panthers.
And as far as I'm concerned, FBI Director J. Edgar Hoover was dead right when he said the Black Panthers are the greatest internal threat to the security of these United States.

This Carmichael joker, former Panther or not, well, they say he is a damn good speaker, and so we don't want this Carmichael getting into the minds of the good black people here in Colorado Springs and stirring them up.
Ron, your assignment is to go to this speech tonight, infiltrate this bunch of subversives and just monitor the audience reaction to Carmichael's speech.
Any chance this thing fucks up?
Just stick to the game plan.
And what if someone offers you a marijuana cigarette?
Soul brother, I'm already high on life. Can you dig it?
And if someone pulls a gun on you?
Barrel of a.45 in your face.
Blood, get that gun out of my face.
Gun is still in your face.
Find a way out of there ASAP.
Relax. We'll be outside listening in.
I just have so many questions to ask him.
How are you doing this evening, my sister?
What? Hakeem, why you dragging me?
It's going to be an amazing night.
Have you heard Brother Kwame speak before?
Oh! Well, actually, I haven't, but...
I didn't realize he changed his name.
Yes, after he moved to Africa.
He took the names of Kwame Nkrumah of Ghana and his mentor, SÃ©kou TourÃ© of Guinea, to honor the great leaders.
You know how he got to Colorado Springs?
The Colorado College Black Student Union invited him.
Oh, I can dig it. I can dig it.
Are you part of the Union?
Really? I'm talking to the president right now?
May I skip the line since I'm talking to the president?
I'll see you inside, my brother.
The Black Student Union of Colorado College is honored to bring the vanguard of revolutionaries fighting for the rights of black people all over the world.
Let's show some black love to the one and only, the brother man with a plan  who is sticking it to the man.
Put your hands together, my people, for our Kwame Ture.
I want to thank all of you, my beloved sisters and brothers, for coming out tonight.
But I'm here tonight to tell you that it is time for you to stop running away from being black.
It is time for you to stop running away from being black.
It is time for you to understand that you, as the growing intellectuals of this country, that you must define beauty for black people.
Is beauty defined as someone with a narrow nose?
'Cause you ain't got none of that.
We are black, and we are beautiful!
You see, we want to be so much like the white people who oppress us in this country.
And because they hate us, and because we are ashamed of our African heritage, we then hate ourselves.
When I was a boy, I used to go to the Saturday matinees and watch Tarzan all the time.
And white Tarzan used to beat up the black natives.
And I would sit there, yelling, "Kill the beasts!
Kill them!" But what I was saying was, "Kill me." That's right.
It was as if a young Jewish boy saw Nazis taking Jews off to concentration camps and cheered them on.
Today, I want those chiefs to beat the hell out of Tarzan and send his lilywhite ass on back to the caves of Europe.
It takes time to become free of the lies and their shaming effects on the black mind.
It takes time to reject the most important lie, that black people can't do the same things  that white people do...
Black Power also means that we must unite.
We must unite, and we must organize to form a base to fight racism.
The vast majority of Negroes around this country, they live in captive communities.
And they must endure their oppression and their conditions, because and only because  they are black and powerless.
Now we are being shot down like dogs in the streets by white racist cops.
I said we are being shot down in the streets by white racist cops!
We can no longer endure this kind of oppression without retribution.
That war in Vietnam, it is not only illegal, it is immoral.
And you know what I tell them?
I'd rather see a brother kill a white racist cop than kill a Vietnamese.
Because at least, if he kills a racist cop he is doing it for a reason, because they are shooting black people...
...in the backs, in these streets, right here in this very country.
I just want to leave you, uh, in closing 'cause I know it's getting late and y'all gotta go party.
I just want to leave you, sisters and brothers, with these last words.
If I am not for myself, who will be?
If I am for myself alone, who am I?
We need an undying love for black people, wherever we may be.
All power to all the people.
All power to all the people!
All power to all the people!
All power to all the people!
"All power to all the people." Pretty powerful stuff.
Do you really think war between the black race and the white race is inevitable?
Get ready, 'cause the revolution is coming.
Pick up a gun and arm yourself, because trust me, it's coming.
You looked great on that stage tonight.
I don't know what you have planned now, but maybe I can buy you a drink?
I gotta make sure Brother Kwame is all squared away...
...and he gets to his hotel safely.
But, you know, um, if it's not too late, maybe I can meet you at the Red Lantern?
All power to all the people.
Bro Pope, Pigs pulled us over.
I don't want to see nothing but black asses and black elbows.
You that socalled bigshot Panther nigger, aren't you?
I heard you was in town, Stokely.
I don't give two shits what your nigger name is!
Black bitch, you get this Black Panther out of Colorado Springs before sunrise, you hear me?
Or you'll all go to jail.
Get your fucking hands off of me!
Get your hands off of her!
Keep your hands off of her!
Come on, get your hands off of her!
I know I should have, but...
The whole thing was so frightening, I didn't.
Come on. Come on, come on, come on.
Come on, you know it, you know it.
Folks were hanging on every word.
Like a Baptist church on Christmas Sunday morning.
Sounds like he had them pretty riled up.
But I don't think that means black folks were ready to start the revolution, Chief.
Nobody in there was talking about that.
He told a room of black folk to get ready for a race war.
That they were going to have to arm themselves and kill cops.
Yeah, he said that, but, Chief, I think it was just talk, you know?
All right, well, thank goodness Carmichael has left Colorado Springs.
He changed his name from Stokely Carmichael to Kwame Ture.
I don't care if he changed his name to that draft dodger, Muhammad Ali.
Did you hear the story Patrice told me?
About how the CSPD pulled over her and Ture?
Patrice, she's the one from the Black Student Union, the group that brought in Ture?
Getting pretty chummy with her, huh?
No, just doing my job, Chief. Undercover.
Let's just make sure it ain't under the cover of the sheets.
I would never jeopardize a case, sir.
He doesn't know what he'd do.
Ron, I'm transferring you to Intelligence.
What will I be doing there?
You have reached the Colorado Springs chapter of the Ku Klux Klan.
Hello. This is Ron Stallworth calling.
I saw your advertisement in the Colorado Springs Gazette.
I'm interested in receiving some reading materials from you.
I'm very much looking forward to you returning my call.
This is Walter returning your call.
Since you asked, I hate niggers.
But my mouth to God's ears, I really hate those nigger rats.
And anyone else, really, that doesn't have pure white Aryan blood running through their veins.
My sister, Pamela, she was just recently accosted by one of those black coons.
Every time I think about that black baboon putting his filthy black hands on her pureaswhitedrivensnow body...
She's a saint. She's an angel.
It makes me want to puke.
You are just the kind of guy that we are looking for.
Listen, uh, when can you meet?
How about Friday night after I get off work?
We'll get right back to you with the details.
Did I just hear you use your real name?
That's your real name, right? Isn't...
Right, isn't that his real name?
Can't believe he just said that.
Well, good luck, Ron, with your new redneck friends.
They want you to join the Klan?
They want to meet me first.
Yeah, well, you probably shouldn't go to that meeting.
So you're a crazy son of a bitch, huh?
We'd have to go to Narcotics, meaning we'd have to deal with Chief Bridges.
Yeah, I can't spare the men.
Well, I've looked over the logs, Chief, and it seems you can spare them.
Sergeant Trapp, Ron spoke to the man on the phone.
All right, when they hear the voice of one of my guys, they're gonna know the difference.
You want me to spell it out for you?
They're going to know the difference between how a white man talks and a Negro.
How exactly does a black man talk?
Okay, Ron, what I think the Chief is trying to say...
If you don't mind, I'd like to speak for myself.
You know what I'm trying to say.
Chief, some of us can speak King's English.
Ron Stallworth here happens to be fluent in both.
Okay, Ron, how do you propose to make this investigation?
Well, I've established contact and created some familiarity with the Klansman over the phone.
I'll continue in that role, but I'll need another officer, surprise, surprise, a white officer, to play me when they meet facetoface.
Chief, black Ron Stallworth over the phone, white Ron Stallworth facetoface, so there becomes a combined Ron Stallworth.
With the right white man, we can do anything.
Anything happens to one of my men, there won't be two Ron Stallworths.
Seems like I heard that one before.
Jimmy, when's the last time they let a rookie lead an investigation?
Okay, all right, let's move on.
It's a straight shot down I25.
KWYD, Christian talk in the morning, although the signal starts to cut out near Pueblo.
On the way back, I like to turn it to 102.7 to get my Allman Brothers fix.
Only I have to change it every time that British fag, David Bowie, pipes on.
Remember, you have to retain all the information you share with these guys so I can be white Ron Stallworth.
Jimmy, I always wanted to be black.
All my heroes were black guys.
But you know my absolute favorite?
We as a Negro people appreciate your love, but don't share that love with these guys.
For you, it's the fucking Osmonds, right?
I get to play you, but you don't get to play me?
I'm on the phone with the Klan.
You meet with them in person.
And you need to try and sound like my voice.
You wanted to be black, here's your chance.
Some people say we've got a lot of malice.
Some say it's a lot of nerve.
Some people say we got a lot of malice.
This is life and death here.
Some say it's a lot of nerve. Nerve!
You want me to do this now?
For all our sakes, do it now, please.
Some say it's a lot of nerve.
I say we won't quit moving till we get what we deserve.
I say we won't quit moving until we get what we deserve.
We've been buked, and we've been scorned.
Why doesn't he just say that?
We've been buked, and we've been scorned.
This has got to flow, from the...
We've been treated bad, talked about.
All right, get that shit out.
We've been treated bad, talked about.
Just as sure as you're born, but just as sure as it take.
Two eyes to make a pair. Huh!
Two eyes to make a pair.
Brother, we can't quit till we get our share.
Brother, we can't quit till we get our share.
Doesn't make grammatical sense, but okay.
Say it loud. I'm black, and I'm proud.
Lose that Jewish necklace around your neck.
Jimmy, it's not a Jewish necklace.
Well, I was told I'd be meeting a Walter Breachway.
I'm gonna need you to hop in the truck.
Okay, well, how about I just follow you in my...
You for the white race, Ron?
Been having trouble lately with these local niggers.
Ugh. Since the Civil War, it's always trouble with niggers.
Walter said something about your sister.
But it's also, you know, camaraderie, I'm looking for with the Klan.
What the fuck did you say?
Not "the Klan." It's "the Organization." The Invisible Empire has managed to stay invisible for a reason.
Do not ever use that word.
A fucking jig on our bumper.
Ron, he sees us. Back off.
Ron, glad you could make it.
I appreciate you inviting me out.
Absolutely. I've been impressed with our conversations over the phone.
I think you have a lot of fine ideas that could really help the cause.
Well, I meant every word I said.
You know, I've had my own share of runins with niggers.
Matter of fact, it's what led me to the Organization.
See, I was, uh, shot and wounded by a couple niggers.
Then my wife was savagely raped by a whole pack of 'em.
That's right,  and not a one of them went to jail.
Hell, it's all you see on TV anymore.
Everywhere you look, it's niggers, niggers, niggers.
Yeah, wasn't long ago them sum bitches wasn't on no TV.
You're forgetting about Uncle Ben and Aunt Jemima.
I kind of like them niggers.
Hey, uh, my name's Ivanhoe, by the way.
Hey, all you get now is how we gotta cater to them.
Hell, they ain't even colored no more.
I've been saying this stuff for years.
Well, you ain't the only one.
It's good to know someone else gets it.
So, what kind of stuff you guys do?
What kind of stuff we do?
We, uh... Cross burnings and marches and stuff so people don't fuck with us.
I'm tired of niggers fucking with me.
Well, then you come to the right place.
Now, how much you know about the history?
Yeah, this is fixing to be a big year for us.
We're gonna make fireworks, aren't we?
All right, all right, Ivanhoe, shut your dumb mouth.
Just to be clear, the, uh...
Oh, nonviolent like that nigger, that dead nigger, Martin Luther Coon.
Ron? You mind coming with me?
How about we go and get that membership process started?
Go ahead and, uh, fill these out.
Now, once they send you your membership card, you'll be able to participate in all our programs.
Imperial tax to become a member, $10 for the year, $15 chapter fee.
Robes and hoods are not included. That's extra.
I can't thank you brothers enough.
This means a lot to me.
Are you trying to offend me?
All right, look, we gotta ask it, is all.
But he's not a Jew, all right? Satisfied?
All right, both of you, give the man some space.
Ron, let me buy you a beer.
They're a little, uh, too friendly sometimes.
What kind of beer you like?
Do not ride his bumper like that.
You think he got a good look at my face?
Technically, they want you to join.
Yeah, they want a black man to join the Ku Klux Klan.
And exactly how much should we be worried about them?
Enough that we'd like to dig deeper.
One of the men discussed plans for a possible attack, so...
I wouldn't give him that much credit.
Ivanhoe said "boom," mentioned something about fireworks.
But personally, I didn't buy it.
Either way, at this point, we're looking for full support from the department on this, Sarge.
Let's move on with the investigation.
Let's try to find out if they are capable of anything.

When we dropped Brother Kwame off at the airport, he told me that the Black Power movement needed strong sisters like me to lead the fight against capitalist oppression and the politicians and pigs who perpetuate it.
His words almost made that whole pig nightmare worthwhile.
I don't really use that word.
"Pigs." Well, what else would you call them?
A bunch of racist cops on a power trip.
So, you think all cops are racist?
It only takes one to pull a trigger on an innocent sister or brother.
Why were you at Brother Kwame's speech?
I don't agree with all of them, but he's a smart brother, definitely worth hearing.
Are you down for the liberation of black people?
Do we always have to talk politics?
Do you ever take time off?
Sister Angela Davis, most righteous sister, can we please spend some quality time together?
And what did you say your JOB is?
But more importantly, I'm a black man who wants to get to know a strong, intelligent, beautiful sister.
The very one I'm looking at right now.
All power to all the people.
Sorry, your voice sounds different over the phone.
I get those all the time.
Listen, wanted to tell you that it was a real pleasure to have you swing by.
I think the brothers really took a liking to you.
If you're free Saturday, why don't you swing by Felix's.
You can meet the rest of the brotherhood. Hmm?
Well, I will see you then.
He, uh, keeps up with these groups.
He says they're moving away from the old violent, racist style.
So, that's what Duke is peddling now.
Current grand wizard of the Klan.
But he's always in a threepiece suit, never seen in a hood or robe in public, and he now goes by "national director." So he's clearly got his sights on higher office.
Think it's another way to sell hate.
Affirmative action, immigration, crime, tax reform.
He says no one wants to be called a bigot anymore.
I guess Archie Bunker made that too uncool.
So the idea is, under all these issues, everyday Americans can accept it, support it, until eventually, one day, he gets somebody in the White House that embodies it.
America would never elect somebody like David Duke president of the United States of America.
Coming from a black man, that's pretty naive.
Ron, hi. I'm Connie, Felix's wife.
It's so nice to meet you.
Do you mind if I, uh, smoke in there?
I'm telling you, a war's acoming.
That'll be the end of the purified white race  as we know it.
Just make yourself right at home.
It's time we go on the offensive.
We gotta make sure that everybody...
Hey, Mike. How are you? Ron.
Ron, why don't you have a seat.
Sorry to interrupt, but I brought some cheese dip and crackers.
Make them remember who we are and what we stand for.
Oh! Oh! Oh! I read something in the Gazette that this nigger named Carmichael held a rally and that some college nigger girl from the Baboon Student Union was attacking our police.
I mean, this girl is dangerous.
She's like that Commie, Angela Davis.
I think we should shut her mouth.
Someday, you're going to need me to do something for you.
And I will be right in here.
Why don't we, uh, get back to our bread and butter.
Let's talk about the next cross burning, which, Ron, you'll be lucky enough to attend if your membership comes in time.
The highest hills get the most eyes.
"Friday night last week, "the Colorado College Black Student Union..." Hey, Ron.
"...hosted a controversial talk featuring Stokely Carmichael "at Bell's Nightingale nightclub." "Black Student Union." "Black Student..." That go together to you?
That sounds fucking weird to me.
I call this the Jew Killer.
I call it a Remington Model 1900.
We got a few more items on the...
Gotta make sure there's no Jew in him.
All right, now you're just being offensive.
Okay? We're talking about someone who's gonna be our brother in a few months.
You see a Star of David around his neck?
Is there a yarmulke on Ron's head?
This is how we lose recruits.
You are going to take this lie detector test.
Is this where you make your candles, you know, and your lampshades?
No, you're gonna take this lie detector test.
Lame or not, you're taking this Jew lie detector test.
Out of respect for this Organization, I'll play along with your little Get Smart bullshit, but I'm no fucking Jew.
They'll say I'm a real friendly guy.
Thing is, I'm only friendly to my friends.
That's the biggest Jewish conspiracy ever.
'Cause I'd say the Holocaust is one of the most beautiful things I've ever seen.
It just makes sense to me.
You have a whole race of leeches that you have to get rid of.
So, what do you do? You starve them, you burn them, you get rid of them.
It's like weeding out roots for the better people.
I hear you Jews do something funny with your dicks.
Oh, is that what this is about?
You're trying to see my big Jew dick, you fucking faggot.
Who you calling a fucking faggot, Jew faggot?
Now, put that fucking strap on your arm.
There's a black lawn jockey on our green lawn!
Kill that son of a bitch!
Yeah, keep driving, you black spear chucker,  piece of shit nigger!
Still want me to take your Jew detector test?
You okay? Back in the house.
That's why we gotta get stronger.
That's what I've been telling all you boys.
You dickheads are fucking with me.
I'm getting a reacharound from the Chief.
It's a big fucking circle jerk!
'Cause if Bridges hears about this, this whole fucking operation's going to be closed down.
And I'm going to be a fucking school crossing guard in fucking the ghetto of Five Points!
I mean, is he gonna hear about it, Sarge?
Charles, can you give us five, please?
I didn't want to say it with Trapp, but that peckerwood had a gun in my face, and he was an ass hair away from pulling the trigger.
And then I would have been dead.
Stopping some jerkoffs from playing dressup?
Well, I'm not risking my life to prevent some rednecks from lighting a couple sticks on fire.
It's not personal, nor should it be.
Why haven't you bought into this?
You've been passing for a WASP.
White AngloSaxon Protestant, cherry pie, hot dog, white boy.
It's what some lightskinned black folks do.
Doesn't that hatred you've been hearing the Klan say, doesn't that piss you off?
Then why you acting like you ain't got skin in the game, brother?
Now, I'm going to get you your membership card so you can go to the cross burning  and get in deeper with these guys.
The Negro wants your  white woman and your job.
The Jew wants your money, and this you...
Sorry, who am I talking to?
This is Ron Stallworth calling from Colorado Springs, Colorado.
Uh, what can I do you for?
I desperately want to participate in my chapter's honorary events, but I can't until I receive my membership card.
Of course that's something I can help you with.
Great. Um, who am I speaking with?
Did you just say your name was David Duke?
Grand wizard of the Ku Klux Klan?
Yes, that grand wizard and national director, yeah.
I'm honored to be speaking with you, sir.
I'm not afraid to say it.
I consider you a true white American hero.
I'm just happy to be talking to a true white American.
It seems like there's less and less of us out there these days.
Yeah, Ron, I understand the situation.
Uh, we've had some administrative problems here.
It's caused a little bit of a backlog.
Tell you what, I'm gonna see to it personally that your membership card is processed, approved and sent out today.
I can't express to you how much this means to me.
I look forward to hopefully meeting you in person one day, and, uh...
You could get hurt like that, hot shot.
The cop that pulled Kwame Ture over that night, was it Landers?
I can smell them a mile away now.
He's been a bad cop for a long time.
Few years ago, he shot and killed a black kid.
He said he had a gun, but he wasn't that type.
Why do you guys tolerate this?
You want to be the guy that rats him out?
You want to go to Landers' office now?
And right or wrong, we stick together.
That reminds me of another group.
You guys heard about this Hide N Seek room?
Here, you got a decent bar turned into a filthy fag bar overnight.
You know, first they get their own bars, then they want equal treatment.
A lot of us are, yeah.
God, I wish I had a scope on this thing.
Hey, Ron. I want to see what you can do  with my.45.
Yeah, maybe you'll get that nigger next time.
Where'd you learn to shoot like that?
Well, my old man bought me a toy cap gun when I was a kid, and been shooting ever since.
That's a hell of a cap gun.
Hey, I'm better than I used to be, right?
You're definitely doing a little bit better, but I don't think "gooder" is a word, but you're doing real good.
But Cleopatra Jones is the one.
It's about time we started seeing a strong sister like that.
Well, Tamara Dobson did play a cop, right?
It's a black exploitation film, which is a fantasy.
Real life is no Cleopatra Jones or Coffy.
What, you don't dig Pam Grier?
She's fine as red wine and twice as mellow.
Pam Grier is doing her thing, but in real life, it's just pigs killing black folks.
What if there was a cop trying to change that?
You can't change things from the inside.
You just give up like that?
We fight for what black people really need,  black liberation.
So, can't you do that from the inside?
The white man won't give up his position in power without a struggle.
What did Du Bois say about double consciousness?
Being an American and a Negro?
Two warring ideals inside one dark body.
I feel that, like I'm two people all the time.
But you shouldn't have to be.
We shouldn't have a war going on inside ourselves.
I got a serious question for you.
A private detective over a pimp any day and twice on Sundays.
Well, Ron O'Neal isn't a pimp, although he played the hell out of one.
That image does damage to our people.
Who you calling jive turkey, jive turkey?
I'm calling you a jive turkey.
I got a Tamara roundhouse coming.
Get out of here with that!
Got a beer for you, Mr. Stallworth.
And your twin is a nigger.
Went over to what I thought was his place.
What address did you go to?
So, you don't know that nigger?
